name: Infinitydisplay
body: # The Infinity Display ## Overview This is a web application that collects parameter values for a LED display. The current version will ask a user for four values: * Equalizer opacity * Wave form opacity * Sound reactive sensitivity * Trail effect intensity These values are then packaged into a text file that is then read by the device driving the LEDs. To use this, the user must have both IntelliJ and Processing installed. A physical LED display is not required to develop code for this project. Animations can be simulated using a Processing GUI. ## Features The Infinity Display provides the following features: * Visual and interactive stimulation * Communication between two programs * Remote access * Blindness ## Version information Play 2.3.7, Bootstrap 3.3.2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
